name: arbutus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any of a number of evergreen trees and bushes (= ones that never lose their leaves) with red fruit: The arbutus is sometimes called the strawberry tree because its fruit resemble strawberries, but it is not related to a true strawberry at all. The slopes of the mountain are covered in forests of arbutus. Higher on the cliff, oaks, hickories, maples, and arbutus grow. Synonym
strawberry tree
More examplesFewer examplesI have a dwarf arbutus in a planter on the patio.This variety of arbutus is native to the Mediterranean and has white, bell-shaped flowers and red fruits.Although it is mostly grown as an ornamental tree, the wood of the arbutus can be used for furniture.
